item.title: WATCH: 'Kitty Fat Camp' helps overweight cats find homes
item.description: ABC News' Danny New talks to one woman who is helping overweight felines shed pounds and live healthier lives.

item.title: WATCH: Pancake ice blankets Lake Michigan
item.description: Drone footage shows pancake ice rolling over waves on Lake Michigan.

item.title: ABC News Exclusive: Former Uvalde officer speaks out after acquittal
item.description: Adrian Gonzales said he stood by his actions and argued he was scapegoated by prosecutors looking for someone to blame.

item.title: Europe must 'play the power game' with Trump over Greenland, former Danish FM says
item.description: Former Danish Foreign Minister Jeppe Kofod told ABC News that Europe must meet U.S. threats over Greenland with strength.

item.title: WATCH: Over 160 million Americans prepare for "potentially catastrophic" winter storm
item.description: The winter storm stretches over 2,000 miles from New Mexico and Texas all the way to Maine. Several states have declared a state of emergency.
